借字: (かりじ) - kanji used for sound equivalence

借屋住居: (しゃくやずまい) - living in rented quarters
借方: (かりかた) - debtor/debit; way of borrowing

借用証書: (しゃくようしょうしょ) - promissory note; written acknowledgment of debt; IOU
借用語: (しゃくようご) - borrowed word; loanword; loan word
借訓: (しゃっくん) - using the Japanese-reading of kanji to represent native Japanese words (irrespective of the kanji's actual meaning)
借貸: (しゃくたい) - loan; lending and borrowing
借金: (shakkin) - dívida, empréstimo, passivos, pegar dinheiro emprestado

借金が嵩む: (しゃっきんがかさむ) - to get deeper in debt; to pile up debts
借金で苦しむ: (しゃっきんでくるしむ) - to be distressed with debts

借金で首が回らない: (しゃっきんでくびがまわらない) - deep in debt
借金のかた: (しゃっきんのかた) - security for a loan
借金の形: (しゃっきんのかた) - security for a loan

借金取り: (しゃっきんとり) - bill collection; bill collector; dun
借金漬け: (しゃっきんづけ) - being deeply in debt; being up to one's ears in debt
借集める: (かりあつめる) - to borrow money; to call for loans
借音: (しゃくおん) - using the Chinese-reading of kanji to represent native Japanese words (irrespective of the kanji's actual meaning)
値: (chi/ne/atai) - value , price, cost; value, worth, merit; value

値する: (あたいする) - to be worth; to deserve; to merit
値上がり: (ねあがり) - price advance; increase in value
値上り: (ねあがり) - price advance; increase in value
値下がり: (ねさがり) - price decline; fall in price
値下がる: (ねさがる) - to decline in price; to fall in price

値動き: (ねうごき) - {bus;finc} price movement; price fluctuation
値参照名: (あたいさんしょうめい) - value reference name
値域: (ちいき) - range (of a function or relation)

値嵩株: (ねがさかぶ) - high-priced stocks; blue-chip shares

値段を高く付ける: (ねだんをたかくつける) - to put a high price on
値踏み: (ねぶみ) - appraisal; estimation; evaluation; setting prices
値遇: (ちぐう) - being appreciated by one's employer; meeting (someone)
倦きる: (あきる) - to get tired of; to lose interest in; to have enough
